name: Medusa (skaiware)
description:
A downloadable game for Linux, Windows (and Mac Os coming soon).

First person action-adventure game exploring the world of physics. 

Key features :
  • First person view
  • physics based world
  • original mix of action and adventure
  • at least 30 minutes of game play 
Controls :
  • mouse to look around
  • "w", "a", "s", "d" (move)
  •  left click to use, equip, grab
  • "p" to pause
Specs :

Minimum specs (low quality mode)  : CPU 4 cores, 200 MB free RAM, Intel(R) UHD Graphics

Recommended specs (high quality mode) : CPU 4 cores, NVidia GTX10X0

Minimum OS : Ubuntu 16 +, RedHat/CentOS 7, Windows 10
